title: The Missing Boy

The Siblings
content: I'm in here, Mom! Can anybody hear me? I'm so scared, please somebody bring me out!
Who am I? Where am I going to do?
We are the best, we are fighting for our friend!
I just want my son back!
We are young, but we are not that bold.
